text.tspan: - Auto repayment instructions can be given for AA Financing.
- Auto repayment mechanism takes care of the new arrangement fees an
There are three types of auto repayment:
- Partial repayment (finance to be settled to extent of the funds available
- None (If the balance is fully sufficient the finance would be fully settl
ed from the account, else no auto repayment would take place)
